summary: WHILE IN PARK, THE BATTERY EXPLODED WHICH ALSO CAUSED THE AIR BAG TO DEPLOY.  *MR  WHILE PARKED, THE RIGHT SIDE FRONT PASSENGER AIRBAG DEPLOYED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE THEY FOUND THAT THE HOPPECKE BATTERY UNDER THE REAR SEAT WAS CRACKED AND BROKEN AND SETTING IN A POOL OF ACID WHICH ACCOUNTED FOR THE ACID SMELL AT THE TIME OF THE AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  THE INCIDENT CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE INTERIOR.  *SCC    *JB
